content: zoom into cuteness with this adorable chick car amigurumi crochet pattern perfect for springtime decor easter baskets or as a charming gift this quirky design features a fluffy little chick cruising in a tiny whimsical car the detailed pattern includes step-by-step instructions clear photos and helpful tips to ensure your project turns out egg-stra special skill level easy finished size approximately 5 inches tall and 5 inches long ✨ features playful chick character with expressive details cute miniature car design with wheels and room in the back for treats perfect for easter nursery decor or a fun toy rev up your crochet hooks and bring this delightful chick car amigurumi to life directions are written in english using u s crochet terms sign up to my fingers fly newsletter and get a coupon for 50% off one pattern link text 1 1 https //www myfingersfly com
